parameters.name: NameCount
parameters.description: Number of documents comprising the model

parameters.name: NameList
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of strings containing the paths and filenames to which to save the model's documents VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IPackAndGo.ISetDocumentSaveToNames
description: Sets the paths and filenames of the documents to save in Pack and Go.
signature:
System.Boolean ISetDocumentSaveToNames( 
   System.Int32
NameCount
,
   ref System.String
NameList
)

parameters.name: NameCount
parameters.description: Number of documents comprising the model

parameters.name: NameList
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of strings containing the paths and filenames to which to save the model's documents VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

returns: True if the paths and filenames are set, false if not
remarks:
The number, order, and type of documents must match the array returned by
IPackAndGo::IGetDocumentNames
. You cannot change the filename of a document if the document is a virtual component. Duplicate files are not allowed.
To remove a file from Pack and Go, specify an empty string for that file's element in the NameList array. To override the paths and filenames set by this method, use
IPackAndGo::SetSaveToName
.
